hadith.text: Asim bin Humaid said:"I heard 'Awf bin Malik say: 'I prayed Qiyam with the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) one night, and when he bowed, he stayed as long as it takes to recite Surat Al-Baqarah, saying: "Subhana Dhil-jabaruti wal-malakuti wal-kibriya' wal-'azamah (Glory be to the One Who has all power, sovereignty, magnificence and might)
